reviewText: i am a Parkinson Disease patient. i exercise daily and this is one of my favorite exercise DVDs. i recommend anyone who has PD to try this as well as the other exercise DVDs of the same series.

I provide fitness classes for individuals with Parkinson's Disease and am always looking for new exercises to challenge them and prevent boredom from repeated exercises. This DVD provided me with some great new exercises which are very appropriate for this population.
